Wholesome & Personal
My pies are handmade with love, crafted with high attention to detail and using only high-quality Swiss ingredients. Each pie measures around 24 cm in diameter and serves 6‚Äì10 people ‚Äî depending, of course, on how big their sweet tooth is.

title: About
text:
:::






Flaky is a cozy home microbakery based in Wallisellen, just outside Z√ºrich, lovingly baking American-style pies and treats ‚Äî from buttery crusts to nostalgic flavors.


Hi, I‚Äôm Marianna üçì
I‚Äôm a researcher by profession ‚Äî and a pastry chef by heart.
Originally from Italy, I trained and became certified in professional pastry before moving to Switzerland in 2016 to pursue my research career.
Growing up, I spent much of my childhood travelling through the USA, where I fell in love with flaky American pies, cookies, and all things sweet.
Now, as a new mom, I‚Äôve opened a small microbakery from my home ‚Äî a space where I can share my love for pastry while spending precious time with my baby.







Chocolat-y Pecan Pie





Sesame Rice Krispies Treats





Lemon Ricotta Cheesecake





Triple Chocolate Cake





Bell Pepper and Feta Cornbread



Why pies? Flaky, buttery layers hold sweet fruits, creamy fillings, or rich spices, baked slowly until golden and bubbling with comfort.
Made just for you üíõ
Every pie and treat is baked fresh to order ‚Äî I only bake after a reservation, so each creation gets the care and time it deserves. I‚Äôm always happy to adapt recipes or flavors for your tastes, and I love working on special requests.





Cinnamon Apple Crumble Pie
Cozy spiced apples tucked under a buttery crumble.
Blueberry Maple Chess Pie
The taste of a maple syrup soaked pancake in a slice.
Chocolat-y Pecan Pie
The richness of dark chocolate with toasty pecans and a hint of salt.



Pumpkin Pie
Creamy spiced pumpkin custard in a crisp, flaky shell ‚Äî fall in a slice.



Sesame Rice Krispies Treats
Chewy, toasty-sweet bars with a nutty sesame twist.
Bell Pepper and Feta Cornbread
Savory-sweet cornbread topped with creamy peppers and tangy feta.




Prices and Order




  



Psst‚Ä¶ I programmed this website myself in Quarto, the code is available here.

title: Flaky
text:
A Note on Pricing
Because each pie is lovingly baked in my home kitchen, the costs are a bit higher than mass-produced alternatives ‚Äî but with that comes something special. I use only high-quality ingredients, take time with every detail, and add a personal touch that makes each pie unique.
Every pie is about 24 cm in diameter and serves around 6 ‚Äì 10 people‚Ä¶ depending on how big their sweet tooth is. ü•ß‚ú®
